div.p: NARRATOR: At the beginning of PRIME for Life we identified what it would feel like to lose the most important things in our lives. For most of us that was just imagination. For these people it is reality.
NARRATOR: Outcomes like these do not always happen, of course. But the risk is always there each time we make high-risk choices. These losses do not have to happen.

NARRATOR: These treasures do not have to be lost. No one has the power to protect these treasures once we make high-risk choices. But each of us does have the power to protect. It is the power of our low-risk choices.
